title: Dad demands answers about daughter's Cancun death
itunes:title: Dad demands answers about daughter's Cancun death
description:
Bill Conner wants to know why daughter Abbey drowned in a shallow pool at a Cancun resort. Local police did not question witnesses before declaring it an accident, the father says. Conner and reporter Raquel Rutledge talk to Nancy Grace in this episode about the investigation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
